instructions: Guess the word in {{tries}} tries. After each guess, the color of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the word.
correctSpotInstructions: The phoneme /ʃ/ is in the word and in the correct spot.
wrongSpotInstructions: The phoneme /f/ is in the word but in the wrong spot.
notInWordInstructions: The phoneme /n/ is not in the word in any spot.
aboutAuthorSentence: This is an open source clone of the game Wordle adapted to {{language}} by <3>{{author}}</3>.
aboutCodeSentence: Check out <1>the original code</1> by <3>Hannah Park</3> or have a look at <5>Aidan Pine's fork</5> and customize it for another language!
aboutDataSentence: The transcriptions of words for this game are based mainly on re-coding of transcriptions in BEEP (https://www.openslr.org/14/) but in part also on a NZE dictionary under development by Catherine Watson (https://profiles.auckland.ac.nz/c-watson).
aboutOriginalSentence: You can also play the original  <1>here</1>
